prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shell and claws, exhibiting a playful personality.
I want a small crab-like Pokemon with bright orange coloration and a mischievous grin.
Generate a Pokemon with large claws and a unique water ability, perfect for beach battles.
Make a cartoonish crab Pokemon that looks both fierce and adorable at the same time.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends into its sandy habitat, featuring vibrant colors and a tough shell.
Design a playful Pokemon that thrives in shallow waters, with a distinct shell and lively demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the ocean, with striking claws and a bright color palette.
